entry.string: Welcome to the Help Desk. Please click New Ticket to submit any questions or problems.
entry.translation: Velcume-a tu zee Help Desk. Pleese-a cleeck Noo Teecket tu soobmeet uny qooesshuns oor prublems. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: If you are a registered site member and are logged in, return to this page and 'View Tickets' to see a response to your inquiries.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo ere-a a regeestered seete-a meembur und ere-a lugged in, retoorn tu thees pege-a und 'Feeoo Teeckets' tu see-a a respunse-a tu yuoor inqooureees.

entry.string: Display box for user to view ticket status by email address and ticket number!
entry.translation: Deespley bux fur user tu feeoo teecket stetoos by imeeel eddress und teecket noomber!
